abilities.name: Trial by Fire
abilities.description: Innate: Gangplank periodically empowers his next basic attack to burn the target, dealing 55 − 225 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD)  bonus true damage over 2.5 seconds, ticking every 0.25 seconds.  Turrets receive 50% reduced damage.
descriptions: Innate: Gangplank periodically empowers his next basic attack to burn the target, dealing 55 − 225 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD)  bonus true damage over 2.5 seconds, ticking every 0.25 seconds.  Turrets receive 50% reduced damage.

If Gangplank successfully hits a target with Trial by Fire, he gains  30% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Every time a  Powder Keg explodes, the  cooldown for Trial by Fire resets and Gangplank gains its  bonus movement speed buff.
Trial by Fire cannot be applied with  Parrrley nor  Powder Keg.

abilities.name: Parrrley
abilities.description: Active: Gangplank shoots the target enemy with his pistol, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit and on-attack effects.
descriptions: Active: Gangplank shoots the target enemy with his pistol, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit and on-attack effects.
Parrrley can  critically strike for (100% +  25%) AD bonus physical damage.
If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders  gold and  Silver Serpents, the latter of which can be spent to upgrade  Cannon Barrage.

abilities.name: Remove Scurvy
abilities.description: Active: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit,  cleansing himself from all  crowd control and  healing himself.
descriptions: Active: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit,  cleansing himself from all  crowd control and  healing himself.

abilities.name: Powder Keg
abilities.description: Passive: Gangplank periodically stocks a Powder Keg, up to a maximum of 3.
descriptions: Passive: Gangplank periodically stocks a Powder Keg, up to a maximum of 3.
Active: Gangplank places a Powder Keg at the target location for 25 seconds, which connects to other nearby Powder Kegs with overlapping explosion radius.

Gangplank and his enemies can attack the Powder Keg with basic attacks, dealing 1 damage per hit. Gangplank may also shoot the barrel with  Parrrley. If Gangplank scores the killing blow, it explodes, also triggering a chain reaction that explodes nearby connected kegs with a brief delay. If killed by an enemy, the keg is safely dismantled.

An exploding keg  reveals its explosion radius for 2 seconds and deals the attack's damage to all enemies struck, plus bonus physical damage against  champions, ignoring 40% of each enemy's  armor, as well as  slowing and  revealing them for 2 seconds. Enemies can only be damaged once per chain.

Attacking a keg with  Spellblade will consume the effect. If Gangplank applies it, the keg will store the damage it would have dealt and add it to the explosion damage as bonus physical damage if it is the initial detonation of a chain.

abilities.name: Cannon Barrage
abilities.description: Active: Gangplank shoots a flare into the air, signaling his ship off-shore to fire upon the target area for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and  revealing it for the duration. Each wave deals magic damage to all enemies within the area and  slows them by 30% for 0.5 seconds.
abilities.leveling: Magic Damage Per Wave:»40 / 55 / 70 / 85 / 100 (+ 10% AP)«Magic Damage Per Cluster:120 / 165 / 210 / 255 / 300 (+ 30% AP)
levelings: Magic Damage Per Wave:»40 / 55 / 70 / 85 / 100 (+ 10% AP)«Magic Damage Per Cluster:120 / 165 / 210 / 255 / 300 (+ 30% AP)

Total Magic Damage:»480 / 660 / 840 / 1020 / 1200 (+ 120% AP)«Total Magic Damage withFire at Will:»720 / 990 / 1260 / 1530 / 1800 (+ 180% AP)«Maximum Mixed Total Damage withFire at Will and Death's Daughter:840 / 1155 / 1470 / 1785 / 2100 (+ 210% AP)
descriptions: Active: Gangplank shoots a flare into the air, signaling his ship off-shore to fire upon the target area for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and  revealing it for the duration. Each wave deals magic damage to all enemies within the area and  slows them by 30% for 0.5 seconds.
Gangplank can purchase upgrades for his ship in the store at the cost of 500  Silver Serpents each, which improve Cannon Barrage:
Death's Daughter: An initial cannonball lands in the center of the barrage, dealing a cluster's worth of true damage to all enemies it hits and  slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.
Raise Morale: The barrage grants allies  30% bonus movement speed while they are inside the area, persisting for 2 seconds after leaving it.
Fire at Will: Cannon Barrage fires「 6 additional waves 」「 2 additional clusters 」 over its duration.

name: Gangplank
title: the Saltwater Scourge
blurb: As unpredictable as he is brutal, the dethroned reaver king Gangplank is feared far and wide. Once, he ruled the port city of Bilgewater, and while his reign is over, there are those who believe this has only made him more dangerous. Gangplank would see...
